Efendi Nahi.verse 113:1: Thuaj: “I lutem dhe mbështetem te Zoti i agimit
Efendi Nahi.verse 113:2: që të më mbrojë nga sherri i të gjitha krijesave,
Efendi Nahi.verse 113:3: dhe prej sherrit të natës kur kaplon terri,
Efendi Nahi.verse 113:4: dhe prej sherrit të falltorëve që fryejnë në nyje (bëjnë magji),
Efendi Nahi.verse 113:5: dhe nga sherri i ziliqarit kur e shfaq zilinë!” magji),

null.verse 113:1: (Ya Peyğəmbər!) De: "Pənah aparıram sübhün Rəbbinə!
null.verse 113:2: Yaratdıqlarının (insanların, cinlərin, vəhşi heyvanların) şərindən;
null.verse 113:3: Zülmətə bürünməkdə olan gecənin (və ya: batan ayın, ziyası sönən ulduzların) şərindən;
null.verse 113:4: (Ovsun oxuyub) düyünlərə üfürən (yaxud: cadu edib iplərə düyün vuran) qadınların şərindən;
null.verse 113:5: Və bir də paxıllığı tutanda paxılın şərindən!"

null.verse 113:1: Reci: "Utječem se Gospodaru svitanja
null.verse 113:2: od zla onoga što On stvara,
null.verse 113:3: i od zla mrkle noći kada razastre tmine,
null.verse 113:4: i od zla smutljivca kad smutnje sije,
null.verse 113:5: i od zla zavidljivca kad zavist ne krije!" sije,

null.verse 113:1: বলুন, আমি আশ্রয় গ্রহণ করছি প্রভাতের পালনকর্তার,
null.verse 113:2: তিনি যা সৃষ্টি করেছেন, তার অনিষ্ট থেকে,
null.verse 113:3: অন্ধকার রাত্রির অনিষ্ট থেকে, যখন তা সমাগত হয়,
null.verse 113:4: গ্রন্থিতে ফুঁৎকার দিয়ে জাদুকারিনীদের অনিষ্ট থেকে
null.verse 113:5: এবং হিংসুকের অনিষ্ট থেকে যখন সে হিংসা করে। থেকে

Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 113:1: Кажи [о, Мухаммад]: Опазил ме Господът на разсъмването
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 113:2: от злото на онова, което е сътворил,
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 113:3: и от злото на тъмнината, когато настъпи,
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 113:4: и от злото на духащи по възлите ,
Tzvetan Theophanov.verse 113:5: и от злото на завистник, когато завиди! ,

null.verse 113:1: 你說:我求庇于曙光的主 ,
null.verse 113:2: 免遭他所創造者的毒害 ;
null.verse 113:3: 免遭黑夜籠罩時的毒害 ;
null.verse 113:4: 免遭吹破堅決的主意者的毒害 ;
null.verse 113:5: 免遭嫉妒時的毒害。 ;

null.verse 113:1: Rci: "Utíkám se v ochranu Pána záře jitřní
null.verse 113:2: před zlem Jeho stvoření,
null.verse 113:3: před zlem temnoty, když se šíří,
null.verse 113:4: před zlem žen, jež do uzlů prskají,
null.verse 113:5: před zlem závistníka, když závidí!" prskají,

null.verse 113:1: Zeg: "Ik zoek mijn toevlucht bij de Heer van de dageraad.
null.verse 113:2: Tegen het kwade van wat Hij heeft geschapen
null.verse 113:3: En tegen het kwade van de duisternis wanneer deze zich verspreidt
null.verse 113:4: En tegen het kwade van degenen die vaste banden door boze inblazingen willen ontbinden
null.verse 113:5: En van het kwade van de benijder wanneer deze benijdt.

Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 113:1: Say: I seek refuge in the Lord of the Daybreak
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 113:2: From the evil of that which He created;
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 113:3: From the evil of the darkness when it is intense,
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 113:4: And from the evil of malignant witchcraft,
Marmaduke Pickthall.verse 113:5: And from the evil of the envier when he envieth.

Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 113:1: Say: I seek refuge with the Lord of the Dawn
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 113:2: From the mischief of created things;
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 113:3: From the mischief of Darkness as it overspreads;
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 113:4: From the mischief of those who practise secret arts;
Abdullah Yusuf Ali.verse 113:5: And from the mischief of the envious one as he practises envy.

Arthur J. Arberry.verse 113:1: Say: ’I take refuge with the Lord of the Daybreak
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 113:2: from the evil of what He has created,
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 113:3: from the evil of darkness when it gathers,
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 113:4: from the evil of the women who blow on knots,
Arthur J. Arberry.verse 113:5: from the evil of an envier when he envies.

Muhammad Asad.verse 113:1: SAY: "I seek refuge with the Sustainer of the rising dawn,
Muhammad Asad.verse 113:2: "from the evil of aught that He has created,
Muhammad Asad.verse 113:3: "and from the evil of the black darkness whenever it descends,
Muhammad Asad.verse 113:4: "and from the evil of all human beings bent on occult endeavours.
Muhammad Asad.verse 113:5: "and from the evil of the envious when he envies.

Martin Lings.verse 113:1: Say I take refuge in the Lord of dawn.
Martin Lings.verse 113:2: I take refuge in the Lord of daybreak.
Martin Lings.verse 113:3: From the evil which He hath created.
Martin Lings.verse 113:4: the evil of that which He hath created.
Martin Lings.verse 113:5: And from the evil of the night when it growth dark.
Martin Lings.verse 113:6: from the evil of dusk when it dimmeth into night.
Martin Lings.verse 113:7: And from the evil of the women that blow upon the knots.
Martin Lings.verse 113:8: from the evil of the women who breathe upon knots.
Martin Lings.verse 113:9: And from the evil of the envier when he envieth.
Martin Lings.verse 113:13: A Sufi Saint of the Twentieth Century (1961) •
Martin Lings.verse 113:15: The Quranic Art of Calligraphy and Illumination (1976) •
Martin Lings.verse 113:21: Splendours of Qur’an Calligraphy and Illumination (2005) ARTICLES•
Martin Lings.verse 113:23: “The Islamic and Christian Conceptions of the March of Time” (1954) The Islamic Quarterly, Vol.
Martin Lings.verse 113:24: “The Origins of Sufism (1956) The Islamic Quarterly, Vol.
Martin Lings.verse 113:25: “Sufism”: Religion in the Middle East (1969); ed.
Martin Lings.verse 113:26: “Sufi Answers to Questions On Ultimate Reality”: Studies in Comparative Religions 1979 Summer/Autumn •
Martin Lings.verse 113:27: “The Nature and Origin of Sufism”: Islamic Spirituality (1985) •
Martin Lings.verse 113:28: “Mystical Poetry”: The Cambridge History of Arabic Literature, Vol.
Martin Lings.verse 113:31: “Human Origins and Destinies According to the Great Religions of the World” •
Martin Lings.verse 113:36: without Quranic Ayaat• Collected Poems• Ancient Beliefs and Modern Superstitions• The Eleventh Hour• The Secret of ShakespeareArticles without Quranic Ayaat• “Signs of the Times”: Studies in Comparative Religions 1970 Winter• “Ibn Aliwah” Encyclopedia of Islam, Second Edition• “Kabd” Encyclopedia of Islam, Second Edition Books

Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 113:1: Say, “I seek refuge with the Lord of the daybreak
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 113:2: from the evil of everything He has created,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 113:3: and from the evil of the dark night when it penetrates,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 113:4: and from the evil of the women who blow on the knots,
Mufti Muhammad Taqi Uthmani.verse 113:5: and from the evil of an envier when he envies.

Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 113:1: Say: ‘I seek refuge in the Lord of the Daybreak,
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 113:2: from the evil of what He has created,
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 113:3: and from the evil of darkness when it gathers,
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 113:4: and from the evil of the women-blowers on knots,
Royal Aal al-Bayt Institute Translation.verse 113:5: and from the evil of an envier when he envies’.

Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 113:1: Beseech: ‘I seek refuge with the Lord of daybreak (or Who brought the universe into existence with an explosion extremely fast),
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 113:2: From the evil influence (and harmfulness) of everything that He has created,
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 113:3: And (in particular) from the evil of the murky night when (its) darkness prevails,
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 113:4: And from the evil of those women (and men) who practise magic on knots by blowing,
Recitations of Ibrahim walk from saheeh.verse 113:5: And from the mischief of every envious person when he envies.

null.verse 113:1: Sano: »Minä etsin turvaa päivänkoiton Herrasta,
null.verse 113:2: sitä pahaa vastaan, mikä on liikkeelle pantu,
null.verse 113:3: ja sitä pahaa vastaan, jonka pimeä yö tuo mukanaan,
null.verse 113:4: niiden pahuutta vastaan, jotka viettelevät päätöksessään lujittuvia,
null.verse 113:5: sekä pahaa vastaan, joka leviää kateellisesta, kun hän kadehtii.

Jean-Louis Michon.verse 113:1: Dis : " Je prends refuge auprès du Seigneur de l'aube
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 113:2: contre le mal de ce qu'Il a créé,
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 113:3: et contre le mal de l'obscurité lorsqu'elle s'étend,
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 113:4: et contre le mal de celles qui soufflent sur les nœuds,
Jean-Louis Michon.verse 113:5: et contre le mal de l'envieux lorsqu'il envie ".

Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 113:1: Dis : «Je cherche protection auprès du Seigneur de l’aube naissante,
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 113:2: contre le mal des êtres qu’Il a créés,
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 113:3: contre le mal de l’obscurité quand elle s’approfondit,
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 113:4: contre le mal de celles qui soufflent (les sorcières) sur les noeuds,
Muhammad Hamidullah.verse 113:5: et contre le mal de l’envieux quand il envie ».

null.verse 113:1: Sprich: «Ich nehme meine Zuflucht beim Herrn der Morgendämmerung,
null.verse 113:2: Vor dem Übel dessen, was Er erschaffen,
null.verse 113:3: Und vor dem Übel der Nacht, wenn sie sich verbreitet,
null.verse 113:4: Und vor dem Übel derer, die auf die Knoten blasen (um sie zu lösen),
null.verse 113:5: Und vor dem Übel des Neiders, wenn er neidet.

null.verse 113:1: Katakanlah: "Aku berlindung kepada Tuhan Yang Menguasai subuh,
null.verse 113:2: dari kejahatan makhluk-Nya,
null.verse 113:3: dan dari kejahatan malam apabila telah gelap gulita,
null.verse 113:4: dan dari kejahatan wanita-wanita tukang sihir yang menghembus pada buhul-buhul,
null.verse 113:5: dan dari kejahatan orang yang dengki apabila ia dengki".

null.verse 113:1: Di': " Mi rifugio nel Signore dell'alba nascente,
null.verse 113:2: contro il male che ha creato,
null.verse 113:3: e contro il male dell'oscurità che si estende
null.verse 113:4: e contro il male delle soffianti sui nodi ,
null.verse 113:5: e contro il male dell'invidioso quando invidia ".

null.verse 113:1: 言え，「梨明の主にご加護を乞い願う。
null.verse 113:2: かれが創られるものの悪（災難）から，
null.verse 113:3: 深まる夜の闇の悪（危害）から，
null.verse 113:4: 結び目に息を吹きかける（妖術使いの）女たちの悪から，
null.verse 113:5: また，嫉妬する者の嫉妬の悪（災厄）から。」 結び目に息を吹きかける（妖術使いの）女たちの悪から，

null.verse 113:1: 일러가로되 동녘의 주님께 보호를 구하며
null.verse 113:2: 창조된 사악한 것들의 재앙으 로부터 보호를 구하며
null.verse 113:3: 어둠이 짙어지는 밤의 재앙으 로부터 보호를 구하며
null.verse 113:4: 매듭으로 마술을 부리는 자들 의 재앙으로부터 보호를 구하며
null.verse 113:5: 시기하는 자의 재앙으로부터 보호를 구하노라

null.verse 113:1: (ئه‌ی محمد (صلی الله علیه وسلم) ئه‌ی ئیماندار) بڵێ: په‌نا ده‌گرم به‌و په‌روه‌ردگاره‌ی که به‌ره‌به‌یان پێش ده‌هێنێت.
null.verse 113:2: له شه‌ڕ و خراپه‌ی هه‌رچی که دروستی کردووه (له په‌ری و ئاده‌میزاد و مار و مێرو).
null.verse 113:3: له شه‌ڕ و خراپه‌ی شه‌و کاتێ که دادێت و دنیا تارک ده‌بێت و ده‌بێته شه‌وه‌زه‌نگ.
null.verse 113:4: له شه‌ڕ و خراپه‌ی ئه‌و که‌سانه‌ی که جادو ده‌که‌ن و په‌ت و ده‌‌زو گرێ ده‌ده‌ن و فوی پیاده‌که‌ن (به‌فێڵ و جادو نێوانی خه‌ڵکی تێک ده‌ده‌ن).
null.verse 113:5: له شه‌ڕ و خراپه‌ی حه‌سود و به‌خیل، کاتێ که حه‌سودی و به‌خیلی ده‌بات.

null.verse 113:1: Katakanlah (wahai Muhammad): Aku berlindung kepada (Allah) Tuhan yang menciptakan sekalian makhluk.
null.verse 113:2: Dari bencana makhluk-makhluk yang Dia ciptakan.
null.verse 113:3: Dari bahaya gelap apabila ia masuk.
null.verse 113:4: Dari kejahatan makhluk-makhluk yang menghembus-hembus pada simpulan-simpulan (dan ikatan-ikatan).
null.verse 113:5: Serta dari kejahatan orang yang dengki apabila dia melakukan dengkinya.

null.verse 113:1: بگو: پناه مى‏برم به پروردگار سپيده صبح،
null.verse 113:2: از شر تمام آنچه آفريده است;
null.verse 113:3: و از شر هر موجود شرور هنگامى كه شبانه وارد مى‏شود;
null.verse 113:4: و از شر آنها كه با افسون در گره‏ها مى‏دمند (و هر تصميمى را سست مى‏كنند);
null.verse 113:5: و از شر هر حسودى هنگامى كه حسد مى‏ورزد!

null.verse 113:1: Dize: Amparo-me no Senhor da Alvorada;
null.verse 113:2: Do mal de quem por Ele foi criado.
null.verse 113:3: Do mal da tenebrosa noite, quando se estende.
null.verse 113:4: Do mal dos que praticam ciências ocultas.
null.verse 113:5: Do mal do invejoso, quando inveja!

Lucrarea (traducere úi editare) a fost r.verse 113:1: Spune: "Eu caut adãpost la Stãpânul revãrsatului zorilor
Lucrarea (traducere úi editare) a fost r.verse 113:3: de la ceea ce El a creat
Lucrarea (traducere úi editare) a fost r.verse 113:4: Și împotriva rãului întunericului care se așterne
Lucrarea (traducere úi editare) a fost r.verse 113:5: Și împotriva rãului vrãjitoarelor care suflã în noduri
Lucrarea (traducere úi editare) a fost r.verse 113:6: Și împotriva rãului pizmuitorului, când pizmuiește.

George Grigore, Coranul.verse 113:2: de răul a ceea ce a creat,
George Grigore, Coranul.verse 113:3: de răul beznei când se lasă,
George Grigore, Coranul.verse 113:4: de răul celor care suflă peste noduri,
George Grigore, Coranul.verse 113:5: de răul pizmaşului când pizmuieşte!” noduri,

null.verse 113:1: Скажи: «Ищу спасенья я у Господарассвета
null.verse 113:2: От зла того, что Он создал;
null.verse 113:3: От зла спустившегося мрака;
null.verse 113:4: От зла того, кто колдовствотворит2339;
null.verse 113:5: От зла завистника,Когда в нем зависть зреет».

null.verse 113:1: Di: «Me refugio en el Señor del alba
null.verse 113:2: del mal que hacen sus criaturas,
null.verse 113:3: del mal de la oscuridad cuando se extiende,
null.verse 113:4: del mal de las que soplan en los nudos,
null.verse 113:5: del mal envidioso cuando envidia».

null.verse 113:1: (நபியே!) நீர் சொல்வீராக: அதிகாலையின் இறைவனிடத்தில் நான் காவல் தேடுகிறேன்.
null.verse 113:2: அவன் படைத்தவற்றின் தீங்கை விட்டும்-
null.verse 113:3: இருள் பரவும் போது ஏற்படும் இரவின் தீங்கை விட்டும்-
null.verse 113:4: இன்னும், முடிச்சுகளில் (மந்திரித்து) ஊதும் பெண்களின் தீங்கை விட்டும்,
null.verse 113:5: பொறாமைக்காரன் பொறாமை கொள்ளும் போதுண்டாகும் தீங்கை விட்டும் (காவல் தேடுகிறேன்).

null.verse 113:1: จงกล่าวเถิดมุฮัมมัด ข้าพระองค์ ขอความคุ้มครองต่อพระเจ้าแห่งรุ่งอรุณ
null.verse 113:2: ให้พ้นจากความชั่วร้าย ที่พระองค์ได้ทรงบันดาลขึ้น
null.verse 113:3: และจากความชั่วร้าย แห่งความมืดของกาลเวลากลางคืน เมื่อมันแผ่คลุม
null.verse 113:4: และจากความชั่วร้าย ของบรรดาผู้เสกเป่าในปมเงื่อน
null.verse 113:5: และจากความชั่วร้าย ของผู้อิจฉาเมื่อเขาอิจฉา

null.verse 113:1: De ki:"Ben ağaran sabahın Rabbine sığınırım,
null.verse 113:2: Yarattığı şeylerin şerrinden,
null.verse 113:3: Karanlığı çöktüğü zaman gecenin şerrinden,
null.verse 113:4: Ve düğümlere üfürüp büyü yapan üfürükçülerin şerrinden ,
null.verse 113:5: Ve kıskandığı vakit kıskanç kişinin şerrinden sabahın Rabbine sığınırım!

null.verse 113:1: کہو کہ میں صبح کے پروردگار کی پناہ مانگتا ہوں
null.verse 113:2: آپ عرض کيجئے کہ ميں (ايک) دھماکے سے انتہائي تيزي کے ساتھ (کائنات کو) وجود ميں لانے والے رب کي پناہ مانگتا ہوںo
null.verse 113:3: ہر اس چيز کے شر (اور نقصان) سے جو اس نے پيدا فرمائي ہےo
null.verse 113:4: ہر چیز کی بدی سے جو اس نے پیدا کی
null.verse 113:5: اور شب تاریکی کی برائی سے جب اس کااندھیرا چھا جائے
null.verse 113:6: اور (بالخصوص) اندھيري رات کے شر سے جب (اس کي) ظلمت چھا جائےo
null.verse 113:7: اور گرہوں ميں پھونک مارنے والي جادوگرنيوں (اور جادوگروں) کے شر سےo
null.verse 113:8: اور گنڈوں پر (پڑھ پڑھ کر) پھونکنے والیوں کی برائی سے
null.verse 113:9: اور حسد کرنے والے کی برائی سے جب حسد کرنے لگے
null.verse 113:10: اور ہر حسد کرنے والے کے شر سے جب وہ حسد کرےo لگے

null.verse 113:1: Тонг Роббисидан паноҳ сўрайман.
null.verse 113:2: У яратган нарсалар ёмонлигидан.
null.verse 113:3: Ва кириб келган қоронғулик ёмонлигидан.
null.verse 113:4: Ва тугунларга дам солувчилар ёмонлигидан.
null.verse 113:5: Ва ҳасад қилган ҳасадчининг ёмонлигидан, деб айт.
